meta.title: Idea Lab - AI App Idea Generator | Aviniti
meta.description: Out of ideas? Our AI will generate 5-6 personalized app concepts tailored to your industry and background

hero_title: Don't Have an App Idea? Let's Discover One Together.
hero_description: Answer 3 quick questions and our AI will generate personalized app ideas tailored to your background, industry, and vision.
step1_title: Tell me about yourself -- what's your background?
step1_helper: This helps us match ideas to your strengths and experience.
step2_title: What industry or area interests you most?
step2_helper: Pick the area where you see the most opportunity.
step3_title: What problem do you want to solve or what opportunity do you see?
step3_helper: Be as specific as you can -- the more detail you give, the better your ideas will be.
results_title: Here Are Your Personalized App Ideas

hero.title: Discover Your Next Big App Idea
hero.subtitle: Answer 3 quick questions and get AI-generated app concepts tailored to you

step1.title: What's your background?
step1.description: This helps us generate ideas that match your expertise

step2.title: Which industry interests you?
step2.description: Choose the area where you want to make an impact

step3.title: What problem do you want to solve?
step3.description: Describe the challenge or opportunity you see
step3.placeholder: Example: Restaurants struggle with managing delivery orders from multiple platforms...

examples.title: Need inspiration? Try these:
examples.example_1: Small businesses can't afford expensive CRM systems
examples.example_2: Parents struggle to find trustworthy babysitters
examples.example_3: Fitness trainers waste time on manual scheduling

step4.title: Where should we send your ideas?
step4.description: We'll email you 5-6 personalized app concepts instantly

idea_card.matched_solution: We have a ready-made solution for this!

errors.problem_too_short: Please describe the problem in at least 10 characters
errors.email_required: Please enter a valid email address
errors.generation_failed: Failed to generate ideas. Please try again or contact us.

inspiration_prompts.prompt_1: I run a clinic and patients always complain about wait times
inspiration_prompts.prompt_2: Students in my country can't find affordable tutoring
inspiration_prompts.prompt_3: Small restaurants struggle to manage delivery orders

results_subtitle: Based on your background as {background} in {industry}, here are ideas that match your vision.
textarea_placeholder: Describe the challenge you're facing or the opportunity you've spotted...

error_generate_more: Failed to generate more ideas. Please try again.
error_generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
cross_sell_analyzer: Want to validate one of these ideas? Let our AI analyze its market potential.
